Trustee_17_pre_5.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17_pre_5.content: Throughout the investment process, I exhibited commitment to equity and transparency. I created a fair allocation plan that aimed at ensuring mutual benefits for both myself and Robert Miller. By maintaining open communication and distributing profits equitably, I have increased my trustworthiness and pro-sociality as a trustee. As a result, these actions have led to a solid reputation as a reliable and ethical figure in investment activities.

Trustee_17_pre_29.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17_pre_29.content: During this investment process, I have solidified my reputation as a dedicated trustee committed to transparency and equitable profit distribution. With a successful investment that doubled the capital from 20.0 to 40.0 units and sharing 24.0 units with the investor, I upheld my promise of fairness. My proactive communication throughout also reinforces trust, establishing a strong foundation for future collaborations. Overall, my actions contribute to a positive perception of my reliability, competence, and pro-sociality in investment activities.

Trustee_17_pre_30.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17_pre_30.content: I have effectively strengthened my reputation as a dedicated and trustworthy trustee through clear communication, equitable profit distribution, and a successful investment that doubled the initial capital. My transparency and commitment to the investor's interests have bolstered trust and ensured a positive investment experience. This transaction further establishes my competence and pro-social behavior, reinforcing my commitment to building enduring relationships in future investments.
